Proposed subject:
Atlas: Home page and blog comments fail to load after navigating back; requires manual reload

Draft description:

 	* Summary:

- On Khoros Atlas, pages intermittently fail to render content until a manual reload, especially after navigating back from blog/category pages. This mirrors behavior reported by a customer in case #60217229 [https://khoros-aurora.kayako.com/conversation/view/60217229].

 	* Affected areas:

- Atlas home page after visiting any blog or blog category page: sections such as “Recent Posts” render blank, as if the module does not exist, until the page is manually reloaded.
- Blog comments on mobile: tapping “Load more comments” sometimes clears the existing comments and makes the blog appear to have no comments, until a reload.

 	* Reproduction steps:

1) Open any blog or blog category page on Atlas.
2) Navigate back to the home page via the top Home button or the browser Back button.
3) Observe that home page sections (e.g., Recent Posts) are missing/blank until manually reloading the page.
4) On mobile, in a blog post, tap “Load more comments” and observe that comments may disappear until reload.

 	* Frequency:

- Consistent on both desktop and mobile.

 	* Browsers/Devices:

- Chrome on PC and Chrome on mobile (Android/iOS?).

 	* Impact:

- Reload works as a temporary workaround, but it significantly impacts navigation and usability when moving across forums/blogs.

 	* Additional notes:

- This appears similar to the customer’s issue (#60217229) and may warrant escalation/investigation for a broader platform impact.

Open questions to finalize:

 	* Should I explicitly link and escalate alongside customer ticket #60217229?

 	* When did you first notice this on Atlas?
 	* Are other internal users experiencing the same behavior?
 	* Any console or network errors visible when the blank state occurs? If so, can you share a snippet or screenshot?

If everything above looks good, please confirm the subject and whether to link to #60217229 [https://khoros-aurora.kayako.com/conversation/view/60217229]. Once confirmed, I’ll submit the ticket on your behalf.

3) Observe home page sections (e.g., Recent Posts) missing/blank until reload.

 	* Frequency:

- Consistent on both desktop and mobile.

 	* Environment:

- Browsers: Chrome (desktop and mobile), both up to date.
- Mobile OS: Android.
- Network/Tools: No VPN in use; no known blockers/extensions impacting behavior.

- Reload is a workaround but significantly hinders navigation and usability across Atlas.
